code: import*as React from'react';import useSelectIcons from'../select/useIcons';export function getPlaceholder(locale,picker,customizePlaceholder){if(customizePlaceholder!==undefined){return locale.timePickerLocale.rangePlaceholder;}return locale.lang.rangePlaceholder;}export function transPlacement2DropdownAlign(direction,placement){const overflow={adjustX:1,adjustY:1};switch(placement){case'bottomLeft':{return{points:['tl','bl'],offset:[0,4],overflow};}case'bottomRight':{return{points:['tr','br'],offset:[0,4],overflow};}case'topLeft':{return{points:['bl','tl'],offset:[0,-4],overflow};}case'topRight':{return{points:['br','tr'],offset:[0,-4],overflow};}default:{return{points:direction==='rtl'?['tr','br']:['tl','bl'],offset:[0,4],overflow};}}}export Object.assign({clearIcon:clearIcon},allowClearConfig);},[allowClear,clearIcon]);return[mergedAllowClear,removeIcon];}
